"Xiera": "A Skip PA will <red>block enemy attacks at the moment you use it<c>! Remember that!"
"Skip PAs make it easy to hit enemies with PAs that are normally difficult to use!"
"Next, let's cover <red>Quick Take<c>. When you learn this skill, after using a PA, if you attack in time with the guide it gives you, you can close the distance to an enemy instantly!"
"Take them out in a flash! When <red>you see the guide appear<c>, <red>use a normal attack or a Weapon Action<c>!"
"Task 3: <yellow>Hit the enemy with a Quick Take attack<c>"
"Task 3: <yellow>Hit the enemy with a Quick Take attack<c>"
